Package com.microsoft.azure.management.graphrbac

Interface PasswordCredential.UpdateDefinitionStages.WithDuration<ParentT>

Type Parameters:
ParentT - the stage of the parent update to return to after attaching this definition
All Known Subinterfaces:
PasswordCredential.UpdateDefinition<ParentT>, PasswordCredential.UpdateDefinitionStages.WithAttach<ParentT>
Enclosing interface:
PasswordCredential.UpdateDefinitionStages
public static interface PasswordCredential.UpdateDefinitionStages.WithDuration<ParentT>
The credential definition stage allowing the duration of key validity to be set.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    PasswordCredential.UpdateDefinitionStages.WithAttach<ParentT>
    withDuration(org.joda.time.Duration duration)
    Specifies the duration for which password or key would be valid.

  • Method Details

    • withDuration

      PasswordCredential.UpdateDefinitionStages.WithAttach<ParentT> withDuration(org.joda.time.Duration duration)
      Specifies the duration for which password or key would be valid. Default value is 1 year.
      Parameters:
      duration - the duration of validity
      Returns:
      the next stage in credential definition
